thread.title: Badotz

author: Badotz
title: Badotz
text: Lately, I find myself drawn to novels I have read many times. I get so lost in them, yet the surroundings are so familiar. So before contempt sets in, I seek new (to me) authors and books recommended to me. ThriftBooks has a supply of books to keep me - heck, the entire country! - busy for the rest of my days and nights. I will always check ThriftBooks before purchasing elsewhere - you should too!
